availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah A. Jones. Father of John W. Jones, Samuel J. Jones, and A.E. Jones. Attorney in Barren County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned four enslaved individuals in Barren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 2, p. 1054.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 2, p. 19.
